bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a tan he 痰核 , phlegm pit, located in the posterior section of the brain. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry fu shi 浮石 quotes Ren zhai zhi zhi fang 仁齋直指方 : 頭核腦痹：頭枕後生痰核，正者為 腦，側者為痹 , “A pit at the head [may be a] brain [pit] or blockage [pit] : When the back of one’s head has developed a phlegm pit, if it is in the center, this is called ‘brain [pit]’. If it is to the sides this is called ‘blockage [pit]’”.
